entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Finally a solid lead! The speeder bikes were, in fact, destroyed by Meatlumps and their lieutenant has agreed to talk to you.
entries.journal_entry_description: Vani Korr has asked you to find a way into the Meatlump Hideout. First, you must find out where it is. To that end, you must speak with a Meatlump Lieutenant named Strilath Farles.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Use one of the Meatlump radios in Doaba Guerfel and speak with Strilath Farles.
entries.task03_start_message: The radio sends a signal when switched on and then shuts back down.
